sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Foster Children's Bill of Rights Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Foster Children's Bill of Rights Act.

sections.heading: Foster Children's Bill of Rights
sections.text: It is the policy of this State that every child and adult in the care of the Department of Children and Family Services who is placed in foster care shall have the following rights:

sections.heading: Foster care provider. Nothing in this Act shall be interpreted to require a
sections.text:
foster care provider to take any action that would impair the health
and safety of children in out-of-home placement.
